com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.beans

Interface ISharedBeanPlatform

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISharedDataPlatform<ISharedBeanDescriptor,ISharedBean,IBeanStorage,IBeanQuery,IBeanQueryResult,IBeanCondition,IBeanAction>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMonitoringServer, DebugEventServer, DistributedApplicationObserver, SharedBeanPlatform

    public interface ISharedBeanPlatform
extends ISharedDataPlatform<ISharedBeanDescriptor,ISharedBean,IBeanStorage,IBeanQuery,IBeanQueryResult,IBeanCondition,IBeanAction>
    Extends the generic super interface to bind serializable Java objects to the generic types.
    Author:
    dawood

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.Serializable getSharedBean(java.lang.String name)
      Get the object stored in the shared bean with the given name.
      boolean shareBeanData(java.lang.String name, java.io.Serializable obj)
      A convenience method to make wrapping a raw serializable with required descriptor, etc, and then calling #shareData(ISharedBean...).
      boolean unshareBeanData(java.lang.String name)
      Remove the named bean from the platform.
